pages.title: Niceness
pages.text: When you were a little child you got told that santa keeps track on how you behave during the year and decides your present content by this. Many people think it was only a trick your parents played on you to make you behave better. But some people say this is true. It was observed that when people go asleep near a tree santa will leave some $(l:patchouli_jam:naughty_or_nice/present)Presents$() under the trees.

It was also observed that people who behaved cruel got harmful presents while people who spread the christmas spirit got luckier there. This was then called the $(5)niceness$(). Niceness will come and go as you perform actions in your world. There are two other chapters on how to $(l:patchouli_jam:naughty_or_nice/gain)gain$() or $(l:patchouli_jam:naughty_or_nice/lose)lose$() niceness.
